Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("No mouse") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Cannon = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local numNeedles = 6
local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") local sparkColors = {Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Color3.new(0,1,0), Color3.new(0,0,1), Color3.new(1,1,0), Color3.new(1,0,1), Color3.new(0,1,1)}
local dart = Instance.new("Part") dart.FormFactor = 3 dart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 2.13) dart.Shape = "Block"
local dartMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") dartMesh.Parent = dart dartMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=45728730" dartMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=45728837" dartMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1)
local rocket = Instance.new("Part") rocket.Size = Vector3.new(0.3, 0.3, 0.3) rocket.Transparency = 0.8 rocket.Shape = "Ball" rocket.FormFactor = 3 rocket.Name ="HC"
local rocketMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") rocketMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" rocketMesh.Name = "Mesh" rocketMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" rocketMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" rocketMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.015, 0.015, 0.015) rocketMesh.Parent = rocket
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Size = 0.1 fire.Heat = 5.0 fire.Parent = rocket fire.Color = Color3.new(124/255, 252/255, 0)
local newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 1000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, newBV.P, newBV.P) newBV.Name = "BV"
local newBT = Instance.new("BodyThrust") newBT.Name = "BT"
local newBF = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBF.P = 10000 newBF.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBF.P, newBF.P, newBF.P) newBF.Name = "BF"
local fireSound local boom
local rocketClone = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function blow(part, hit) if hit.Name ~= "rocketClone" then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.Name = "SPLODE" e.BlastPressure = 5000 e.BlastRadius = 3 e.Position = part.Position e.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(e, 1.0)
if boom then boom:Play() end if part then part:Remove() end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid and vPlayer then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function shoot(pos) vCharacter = Tool.Parent
if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then print("Player not found") return end
if fireSound then fireSound:Play()end
for i = 1, 9 do tick() rocketClone[i] = rocket:Clone() rocketClone[i].CanCollide = false
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 8.0
rocketClone[i].CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) + Vector3.new(math.random() * 2, math.random() * 2, math.random() * 2) rocketClone[i].Velocity = pos * 40.0 rocketClone[i].Name ="rocketClone" rocketClone[i].Parent = game.Workspace
local rocketCloneFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") rocketCloneFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, rocketClone[i]:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) rocketCloneFloat.Parent = rocketClone[i]
rocketClone[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(rocketClone[i], hit) end)
debris:AddItem(rocketClone[i], 6.0) end end
function pierce(missile, hit) if missile and hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(13) end end end
function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
littleSpark = spark:Clone() littleSpark.Parent = missile littleSpark.Color = sparkColors[math.random(1,#sparkColors)]
if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*5 dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 5
-- convert to a 2D space deltaXZSquared = dPos.X*dPos.X + dPos.Z*dPos.Z deltaXZ = math.sqrt(deltaXZSquared) deltaY = dPos.Y
alpha = math.random()*math.pi/8 + math.pi/3
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01) missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20)
gravity = 196.1643 numerator = -0.5*gravity*deltaXZSquared denominator = math.cos(alpha)*math.cos(alpha)*(deltaY - math.tan(alpha)*deltaXZ)
if denominator == 0 then return end missileSpeed = math.sqrt(numerator / denominator) if missileSpeed > 300 then missileSpeed = 300 end vXZ = missileSpeed * math.cos(alpha) vY = missileSpeed * math.sin(alpha) vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaXZ vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaXZ missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ)
missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random() missile.Shape = math.random(0,2)
missile.Name = "Spark" missile.Reflectance = 1 missile.Transparency = 0 missile.CanCollide = false
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .1 confettiBang:Play() end end
function throw(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil then return end local vHum = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if vHum == nil then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos*5
local missile = dart:Clone() missile.Transparency = 0 missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + dPos) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2)
missile.Velocity = dPos * 50 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) missile.Name = "ThrownKunai" missile.CanCollide = true
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass() * 196.1,0) force.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
debris:AddItem(missile, 4)
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missile, hit) end) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
tick() local projectileType = math.random(1, 3)
if projectileType == 1 then -- do Confetti for i = 1,25 do local targetPos = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = targetPos - vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position fire(lookAt) wait(0.1) end elseif projectileType == 2 then -- do eneryballs local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (target - myTorso.Position).unit
shoot(lookAt) else print("Darting") -- do darts local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (target - myTorso.Position).unit
for i = 1, numNeedles do xNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 yNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 zNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 throw(CFrame.Angles(xNoise, yNoise, zNoise) * lookAt) wait(0.1) end end
wait(3.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
